text:
Mansueto Bianchi (4 November 1949 − 3 August 2016) was an Italian Roman Catholic bishop. He was born in Lucca, Tuscany.
Bianchi ordained to the priesthood in 1974, he served as bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Volterra, Italy from 2000 to 2006. He then served as bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Pistoia from 2006 to 2014.
Bianchi died on 3 August 2016 in Rome at the age of 66.
